name: Consumed By Chaos
description:
Consumed By Chaos is my submission for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2

This game is very unfinished, and only consists of a minute or so of gameplay. Nonetheless, I still wanted to release my work out to the public.

Please feel free to leave any suggestions, however I most likely will not continue to work on this game.

Credits:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset - tileset used

https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/ - software used to generate SFX
